sentences.english: Are supervisors trained to be coaches?
sentences.chinese: 督学人员是否被训练成为了教练？

sentences.english: The (superintendent) of our school is responsible for our education.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校督学对我们的教育负责。

sentences.english: The school inspectors make an unannounced visit .
sentences.chinese: 督学们进行了一次突击视察。

sentences.english: After he excelled at St. Paul's he entered college at Christ's College at Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 之后，他善于圣保禄他进入学院基督学院在剑桥大学。

sentences.english: She cast a glance of surprise at the school inspector before her.
sentences.chinese: 她用惊奇的眼光望了一眼面前的督学。

sentences.english: Once a superintendent of schools was visiting a three-room school.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，一位督学去视察一个只有三间教室的学校。

sentences.english: Once a superintendent of schools was visiting athree-room school.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，一位督学去视察一个只有三间教室的学校。

sentences.english: Recite the Lord's Prayer - in Russian, Inspector Hornberg ordered.
sentences.chinese: “背诵主祷文，要用俄语，”霍恩伯格督学命令道。

sentences.english: The Superintendent of Schools has approached several educators about filling the principal 's job .
sentences.chinese: 这个督学已经向几位教师提到要完成校长给的工作。

sentences.english: The superintendent swaggered into the schoolyard.
sentences.chinese: 督学阔步高视地走进校园。

definition: school official responsible for supervising the students (old)
to give classes/to work as a teacher
scholar preparing for imperial examinations (in former times)
Imperial scholar from the Ming Dynasty onwards
inspector-general of province in Ming and Qing times
to attend/to take office/to be present (in administrative capacity)
temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
